name: Cats Shootout
description:
This game is a game about 2 cats fighting.

This game is a remix of 20below0's game "chicken shootout"

Here is the original project:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/484298072

Trailer:

This game was remixed in like 4-5 days but its still pretty cool :)

You can battle with an AI that goes easy on you, an AI that goes hard on you, watch 2 AIs battle or fight with your friends :)

Also there's a lot of chaos in this game so yeah... it's pretty epic!

HAVE FUN!
